skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Using the tricks of Loec, the Shadow King excels at remaining unseen, allowing him to go almost anywhere.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: While there are traitors and minions of Malekith abroad, the Shadow King cannot – must not – rest.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15% after winning a battle

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: An unseen force, returned to take vengeance on those who have wronged the loyal folk of Nagarythe.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Led by their king, the deadly Shadow Warriors are the most ruthless of all Ulthuan's warlike children.

effects.description:
Speed: +20% for Shadow Warriors and Shadow-walkers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Shadow Warriors and Shadow-walkers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Shadow Warriors and Shadow-walkers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: He will look for you, he will find you, and he will kill you.

effects.description:
Income from sacking and looting settlements: +30%
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As he is a master of ambushes and surviving certain death, the prospect of facing Alith Anar is always a deadly one.
Alith Anar is willing to use any means to destroy his enemies; his vengeance has no limits.
He may lurk in the Shadows, but Alith Anar is as much royalty as any of Ulthuan's princes.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Creates an image of Alith Anar

attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: These enchanted arrows have been carefully crafted from the pale-wooded trees that grow near the Grove of Avelorn.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

skillTree.localised_description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

skillTree.localised_description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

skillTree.localised_description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

skillTree.localised_description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

skillTree.localised_description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

skillTree.localised_description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

skillTree.localised_description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

factionEffects.localised_description: Alith Anar's shadow court meets only rarely, but when it does, vengeance upon the Druchii is the only real agenda.

effects.description: Eliminating characters that are Marked for Death grants various rewards
Invocation of Morai-Heg: Summons unique Hero Hand of the Shadow Crown

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Where Alith Anar stalks, so come the ravens to feast on the carrion in the Shadow King’s wake.
